# What is Firebase?

- Started in 2012
- Purchased by Google in 2014
- Powerful enough for realtime gaming
- Simple enough for quick demo apps
- Minimizes need for server code
-JzZ5K99_dp0QTbZSBBR.content:
What is Firebase?

  • Started in 2012
  • Purchased by Google in 2014
  • Powerful enough for realtime gaming
  • Simple enough for quick demo apps
  • Minimizes need for server code
-JzZ5K99_dp0QTbZSBBR.title: Why Firebase?
